mapper.sql: id, loginName, password, name, sex, phoneNum, photo, email, userType, createDate, oldLoginIp, oldLoginDate, loginFlag, birthDate, idType, idNumber, identityImg, nationality, nation, politicalStatus, graduateInstitutions, professional, education, qualification, bloodType, nativePlace, contactAddress, postalNumber, fixedTelephone, otherContact, workTitle, workPost, workName, workIndustry, workNature, is_del, did, modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_del = 0

SELECT
FROM sys_user where did = #{did} AND id in (SELECT r.user_code FROM sys_role s JOIN sys_user_role r ON r.role_code = s.id AND s.power = #{power})

select
from sys_user where loginName = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_del = 0

select
from sys_user where is_del = 0
and loginname LIKE concat(concat("%",#{loginname}),"%")
and name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{name}),"%")
AND did IN
#{dids.id}
AND did is NULL OR did=''
order by createDate desc
limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}

select
from sys_user is_del = 0 and userType=1
and name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{keyword}),"%")
AND did IN
#{dids.id}
AND did is NULL OR did=''
order by createDate desc
limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(id) as count from sys_user is_del = 0 and userType=1
and name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{keyword}),"%")
AND did IN
#{dids.id}
AND did is NULL OR did=''
order by createDate desc

select count(id) as count from sys_user where is_del = 0
and loginname LIKE concat(concat("%",#{loginname}),"%")
and name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{name}),"%")
AND did IN
#{dids.id}
AND did is NULL OR did=''
select count(id) as count from sys_user where is_del = 0
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual
